body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Julie Schrader Smith in Oldham County, Kentucky, in 1836. Father of John F. Smith, William B. Smith, Benjamin M. Smith, Sarah F. Smith, Annie E. Smith, Ballard S. Smith Jr., and Park C. Smith. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.
